div.p: A certain member of the ministers from the previous year was condemned to the fire six weeks ago in the month of September.
The Parliament had to subscribe to its (?) decisions. Many refused.

The King, however, wanting to know, heard from the Parliament not the least, who nevertheless adorned and defended the message in such a way that the King, having been rebuffed by complaints, finally said that he would think more diligently about this matter. A certain Barb√ºrinus from Geneva, if I hold the name correctly, is taking care of the notes at his own expense.
In the new testament, hear through our Gessner, for what reason he was detained in chains through the blockade(?)... released under the condition that he orders Gessner to stop.
Regarding this matter, he made letters from the magistrate to my most honorable senate.
